column5: I have next weekend off and am going to take my son fishing .. cant decide where to go  .. its between Barrie for perch, Dunnville for eyes (skunked there today), Picton for eyes, and St Claire for musky's .. where would you go??

Well it looks like simcoe takes it .. now on where to go .. does anyone know if they are getting perch around the Tiffin st launch or should I try cooks bay .. only really fished Simcoe in the winter on cooks bay.. fished a few years back off shore by the tiffin st launch but that was a little later in the year .. thanks
